name: Minimal, Wide and Dark Facebook v.1.1
description: Hello there, It's Fers4t. I'm here with a minimal, wide and dark Facebook style. First of all, I'm not the owner of all codes. So big part of codes has coded by another coder*. I'm just developed it and make it more minimal and wide. Hope you like it. Thanks.
additional_info:
# v1.1
- Right bar completely deleted. It was appearing sometimes.
- Size of content column in group pages has fixed with banner. It was small because of Facebook.
- All images are center now.
- Deleted that which useless and boring right column on Facebook pages. 
- Profile page cleaned. Now just "profile" is there. 
- Profile page's width fixed. Now it's wide.
- Making center everything.

*Source style: https://userstyles.org/styles/136318/clear-dark-facebook-by-book777
css:
@-moz-document domain("facebook.com"), domain("messenger.com"), regexp("http(s?)://(www.|)facebookcorewwwi.onion(.*)") {
/*
	---
	Developer: Fers4t (@yesilozof)
	---
	These codes are written by Mikalai Buk, like you can see in the bottom line. I'm just developed this for have a minimal aspect. 
	---
	Author: Mikalai Buk (book777 / nikolia0612)
	https://fb.com/userstyles.136318
	Version 8.6.10
*/

:root {
    --bg-color-background: #23232d;
    --bg-color-first: #2c2c36;
    --bg-color-second: #26262f;
    --bg-color-hover: #3b3b4b;
    --border-color-top: #2c2c36;
    --border-color-right: #2c2c36;
    --border-color-bottom: #2c2c36;
    --border-color-left: #2c2c36;
    --icon-change-partly: 81%;
    --icon-change-full: 100%;
    --text-color-first: #dfdfdf;
    --text-color-second: #a7a7a7;
    --text-color-green: #42b72a;
    --text-color-blue: #8ba2d2;
    --text-color-red: #f13f3f;
    --photo-blur: 0px;
    --photo-brightness: 100%;
    --photo-contrast: 100%;
    --opacity-chat-head: 1;
    --hover-timeout: 0.5s;
}
